apps.name: Tenant App
apps.tagline: Property and resident services in one app
apps.description: Property management and resident services platform enabling tenants to reserve halls, manage contracts, request services, view invoices, and interact with property management—all in one user-friendly app.

apps.name: Self Service
apps.tagline: Employee HR services on your phone
apps.description: Access loans, advances, overtime, and time-off requests with an easy interface to submit requests, track status, and view personal information.

apps.name: Yalla Go
apps.description: Travel advice for hotels and guides, flight and hotel booking, and tourism company offers—all in one place.

apps.name: Wastet Kheer
apps.description: E-commerce platform for food, drinks, accessories, and more—with live order tracking and push notifications.

apps.name: Cocoon
apps.description: Fashion and accessories e-commerce app to discover and shop the latest styles.

apps.name: PostEx
apps.description: Shipping and merchandise tracking for retail, with automated delivery tracking so you always know where your package is.

apps.name: Beaut
apps.description: Jordanian app for hand and home food—discover local sellers and order with ease.

apps.name: Shaqqty
apps.description: Buy, sell, and rent apartments with advanced search and direct communication features.

apps.name: Takfa
apps.description: Saudi app for requesting technical repair technicians with a simple, user-friendly experience.
